name: A Guide to Exploring Abandoned Churches
name_original: A Guide to Exploring Abandoned Churches
description:
Exploring abandoned buildings sounds fun, right?  Hopefully, you're prepared for the consequences of stumbling into an old church that shouldn't be accessible to morals.

A Point and Click horror game made with traditional art. 10-minute max playtime.  If you feel stuck, keep exploring until something decides to show itself.

Inspired by a tumblr post made by rocky-mountain-gothics. https://rocky-mountain-gothics.tumblr.com/post/182095213071/a-guide-to-exploring...

Royalty Free Music by Vladimír Hirsch. http://www.vladimirhirsch.com/e_menu.html
